mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_details ( task_id, file_id, page_index, image_type, path, create_time ) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{fileId}, #{pageId}, #{imageType}, #{path}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT b.file_name, a.page_index, a.image_type, a.path FROM task_details a, user_file b WHERE a.file_id = #{fileId} AND a.file_id = b.file_id
